sentence.Network_en: Today, fashions in clothing are becoming increasingly epicene.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天服装的流行款式越来越中性了.

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Green's epicene style of writing appeals to nobody.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有人对格林先生软弱的文体发生兴趣.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a grammatical term): via late Latin from Greek epikoinos (based on koinos 'common')
